rukus.text: Eteke tumi upadesa di thaka, karana tomara pratipalakara anugrahata tumi ganako nahaya arau unmado nahaya
Sihamte kaya neki ye, e'om (muham'mada) ejana kabi? Ami tara mrtyura pratiksa karaicho
Koraa, ‘tomaloke apeksa karaa, mayo tomalokara lagata pratiksakaraisakalara antarbhukta ha’lo’
Sihamtara bibeka-bud'dhiye sihamtaka e'i adesa diye neki? Ne sihamta simalanghanakarai sampradaya
ne sihamte kaya, ‘e'i kora'ana e'om nije'i racana karaiche’? Baram sihamta imana naniba
Tente sihamte yadi satyabadi, tetiyaha’le sihamte iyara darae kono bani lai ahakacona
sihamte srastabihina srsti haiche neki, ne sihamta nije'i srasta
ne sihamte akasamandala arau prthirai srsti karaiche? Baram sihamte drrha bisbasa nakarae
Tomara pratipalakara gopana bhandara sihamtara ocarate neki, ne sihamte'i sakalo bastura niyantranakarai
ne sihamtara ocarata mai ache, ya’ta araohana karai sihamte (urd'dhajagatara katha) sunibalai paya? Tente sihamte suna se'i spasta pramanato lai ahakacona
ne kan'ya santana te'omra babe; arau putra santana tomalokara babe
tumi sihamtara ocarata pratidana bicaraa neki ye, sihamte iyaka eta durbaha boja buli bhabe
ne sihamtara ocarata adrsyara jnana ache, yito sihamte likhe
ne sihamte kono sarayantra karaiba bicarae? Eteke yihamte kupharai karae sihamte'i ha’ba sarayantrara cikara
Ne allahara bahirae sihamtara kono ilaha ache? Sihamte yi sbirka karae tara paraa allaha paraitra
Arau akasara kono tukuraa bhani paraa dekhile'o sihamte ka’ba, ‘e'ito eta punjibhuta megha’
Eteke sihamtaka erai diya se'idina paryanta, yidina sihamta bajraaghatata akraanta ha’ba
Se'idina sihamtara sarayantra kono kamata nahiba arau sihamtaka sahaya'o karaa naha’ba
Arau niscaya yihamte an'yaya karaiche sihamtara babe ache iyara bahirae'o arau sasti. Kintu sihamtara adhikansa'i e'i katha najane

Arau tumi tomara pratipalakara sid'dhantara oparata dhairya dharana karaa; karana tumi amara cukura sanmukhate acha. Tumi tomara pratipalakara prasansara saite paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karaa yetiya tumi thiya horaa
Arau te'omra paraitrata ghosana karaa nisara bhagata arau taraabora astamita horaara pichata
